example.parse: (CONJ و) (S (VP (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I تدفن) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (NP-OBJ (NOUN+CASE_DEF_ACC رأس) (NP (POSS_PRON_3FS ها))) (PP (PREP في) (NP (DET+NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN التراب))) (SBAR-PRP (SUB_CONJ حتى) (S (VP (PRT (NEG_PART لا)) (IV3FS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I ترى) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *)) (SBAR-NOM-OBJ (WHNP-6 (REL_PRON ما)) (S (VP (IV3MS+IV+IVSUFF_MOOD:I يجري) (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-6)) (PP (PREP من) (NP (NOUN+CASE_DEF_GEN حول) (NP (POSS_PRON_3FS ها))))))))))))

arg.g: so that it doesn't see what is going on around it

example.arg: حتى لا ترى ما يجري من حولها
